text.div:
BC BreastCancerStageVS ValueSet

Codes that designate concepts describing breast cancer stage group, according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

name: BreastCancerStageVS
title: BC BreastCancerStageVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Codes that designate concepts describing breast cancer stage group, according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

concept.display: The concept designated by the symbol 0 in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IA in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IB in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IIA in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IIB in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IIIA in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IIIB in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IIIC in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
The concept designated by the symbol IV in Version 8 of AJCC's breast cancer staging guide.
